title: Topic 001 Question 203
body: A company needs to implement a managed file system to host Windows file shares for users on premises. Resources in the AWS Cloud also need access to the data on these file shares. A SysOps administrator needs to present the user file shares on premises and make the user file shares available on AWS with minimum latency.
What should the SysOps administrator do to meet these requirements?
options: Set up an Amazon S3 File Gateway.
Set up an AWS Direct Connect connection.
Use AWS DataSync to automate data transfers between the existing file servers and AWS.
Set up an Amazon FSx File Gateway.
